title: Honey flapjacks
description: The best flapjacks are gooey, chewy and, above all, simple. These fruit-filled treats are great to make with children.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz nuts, dried fruits or glacé ginger, chopped or desiccated coconut (optional)
You will also need a 20cm x 30cm (8in x 12in) cake tin, greased
